With the Garmin Fenix ​​7X Solar connected watch, enjoy record battery life at the cheapest price of the moment. The Garmin Fenix ​​7X Solar recharges using sunlight, providing record battery life of up to 37 days. Ideal for practicing sports, the Garmin Fenix ​​7X Solar has seen its price drop to the lowest on Amazon.
Garmin Fenix ​​7X Solar: the Garmin Fenix ​​7X Solar connected watch is on sale at the lowest price on Amazon The Garmin Fenix ​​7X Solar connected watch is on huge sale at 552.76 euros instead of 849.99 euros on Amazon. A crazy -30% promotion for this popular connected watch sought after by athletes and lovers of sporting sensations.
The Garmin Fenix ​​7X Solar Edition is ideal for practicing all sports, from running to swimming, trail running, skiing, climbing, cycling and rowing. Hiking enthusiasts can benefit from advanced mapping and precise geolocation thanks to support for GPS satellite navigation systems.
The watch also tracks your physical performance and informs you of your fatigue level to alert you in the event of too much effort. In addition to monitoring your heart rate and the oxygen level in your blood, the quality of your sleep is also at the center of the functionalities of this gem from Garmin.
